entry.title: notification
entry.content: 注意必须是HTTPS 才能开启通知 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445<!DOCTYPE html><html><head> <title>Notification</title> </head> <body> <script type="text/javascript"> Notification.requestPermission().then(function(result) { if (result === 'denied') { console.log('被拒绝'); return; } if (result === 'default') { console.log('The permission request was dismissed.'); return; } // Do something with the granted permission. function notice() { var notification = new Notification("你好，JavaScript",{ body:'微信订阅号', }); notification.onclick = function(){ notification.close() } } }); </script> </body> </html> 手册地址 https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/notification/Notification
